title: Co-culture of benzalkonium chloride promotes the biofilm formation and decreases the antibiotic susceptibility of a Pseudomonas aeruginosa strain
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00035H, Paper
Caihong Wang, Qiao Ma, Jiaxin Zhang, Nan Meng, Dan Xu
The physiological and biochemical behaviors of Pseudomonas aeruginosa were modulated using benzalkonium chloride, potentially through the attenuation of the quorum sensing system.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
